title.narrative: Support to Develop Ethiopian Investment Commission

description.narrative: This activity (Support to Develop Ethiopian Investment Commission) is a component of Macroeconomic Support Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £591,913. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Business Policy and Administration, Industrial policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: London School of Economics and Political Science. The start date is 24-09-2014 and the end date is 30-06-2018.

participating-org.narrative: London School of Economics and Political Science

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 1
